official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to increase by 10 percent the Federal share of projects for applicants providing discounts on sewage rates for senior citizens.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to increase by ten percent the Federal share of waste treatment projects for applicants providing at least a 25 percent discount on sewage rates for senior citizens.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to increase by 10 percent the Federal share of projects for applicants providing discounts on sewage rates for senior citizens.
